tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditionally Exempt / 78th qualifier from Qualifying Tournament, Money List 61-100
tourBios.carHigh: Will be a rookie on Tour in 2012. Has yet to play in a Web.com Tour or PGA TOUR event. 2009: Played on the Hooters Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Was named First-Team All Big South Conference (2007 and 2008)...Won one individual title in college...Giles High School team in Pearisburg won the Single A Virginia State Golf Championship.
tourBios.personal: Non-golf realted jobs held since college include substitute teacher and cart attendant at a golf course...Golf instructor is Stephen Slotterback...Biggest thrill in golf was making his first hole-in-one. Biggest thrill outside the sport was graduating from college...Favorite courses he has played include Bethpage State Park's Black Course and Aronimink CC outside Philadelphia. Courses he would most list to play are Augusta National, St. Andrews and Pebble Beach...Currently drives a Pontiac G6...Favorite website is youtube.com...Favorite pro team is the New York Yankees. Favorite TV shows are "The Unit" and "The Big Bang Theory." Favorite group is the Dave Matthews Band. Favorite food is steak. Favorite athletes to watch are Aaron Rodgers and Mariano Rivera...Twitter account name is @hamptonballard...Favorite gadget is his iPhone...Favorite app is Words with Friends. Dream foursome would include Ben Hogan, Jack Nicklaus and his grandfather. Bucket list includes visiting every continent and skydiving.
